help.description: Lists out all the commands that KelleeBot has.

resources.description: Links you to important resources to help BIPOC and LGBTQ+ communities.

userinfo.description: Gives information about yourself or another member in the server.

art.description: Retrieve information about a specific artwork in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

bug.description: Retrieve information about a specific bug in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

dream.description: Show's the server owner's ACNH dream address, if they have one set.

fish.description: Retrieve information about a specific fish in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

recipe.description: Retrieve information about a specific recipe in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

sc.description: Retrieve information about a special character in any Animal Crossing.

sea.description: Retrieve information about a specific sea creature in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

villager.description: Retrieve information about a specific villager in any Animal Crossing game.

bunny.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture/gif of a bunny.

cat.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture of a cat and provides you with a random cat fact.

dog.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture of a dog and provides you with a random dog fact.

fox.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture of a fox and provides you with a random fox fact.

koala.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture of a koala and provides you with a random koala fact.

panda.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture of a panda and provides you with a random panda fact.

shiba.description: KelleeBot shows you a random picture a shiba dog.

dadadvice.description: KelleeBot gives you a random dad advice.

dadjoke.description: KelleeBot tells you a random dad joke.

blackjack.usage: !blackjack <The amount you want to gamble OR all>

gamble.description: Users can gamble away the amount of points that they have.
gamble.usage: !gamble <The amount you want to gamble OR all>

points.description: Displays how many points you or another user has and their current ranking.

slots.description: Play the slots and test your luck. Each slot win gives you 4 times the amount you bet.
slots.usage: !slots <The amount you want to gamble OR all>

character.description: Retrieve information about a specific character in Genshin Impact.

recipes.description: Retrieve information about a specific recipe in Genshin Impact.

uid.description: Show's the server owner's UID, if they have one set.

weapon.description: Retrieve information about a specific weapon in Genshin Impact.

country.description: Gives you information about a country.

fc.description: Shows the server owner's Nintendo Switch friend code, if they have one set.

food.description: KelleeBot shows you a random meal.

movie.description: Gives you information about a movie.

tv.description: Gives you information about a tv show.

ty.description: KelleeBot gives you or another user a random compliment.

weather.description: Gives you the current weather of the specified location.

ban.description: Bans a user/member from the server.

history.description: Shows moderation history of a user.

kick.description: Kicks a member from the server.

mute.description: Mutes a member in the server.

softban.description: Softbans a member from the server.

unban.description: Unbans a member from the server.

warn.description: Warns a member in the server.

lyrics.description: Shows lyrics for either what's currently playing or for what's specfied.

queue.description: Displays all the songs that are currently in the queue.

volume.description: Adjusts the volume of the song.

pokemon.description: Retrieve information about a specific Pokémon.
